args: early-stopping-enabled=true model-type="bpr" embedding-dim=128 mlp-hidden-dims="128,64" fusion-type="add" lr=0.005000 weight-decay=0.000010 dropout=0.100000 local-epochs=12 num-negatives=1 num-server-rounds=50 fraction-train=1.000000 strategy="fedavg" proximal-mu=0.010000 alpha-method="multi_factor" alpha-min=0.100000 alpha-max=0.950000 alpha-quantity-threshold=100 alpha-quantity-temperature=0.050000 alpha-weight-quantity=0.250000 alpha-weight-diversity=0.350000 alpha-weight-coverage=0.200000 alpha-weight-consistency=0.200000 prototype-momentum=0.900000 early-stopping-patience=10 early-stopping-metric="sampled_ndcg@10" early-stopping-min-delta=0.001000
